title: Handle a Customer Complaint
description: A customer is calling to complain about a rude gate agent during their last trip.

tasks.description: Listen to the customer's complaint empathetically and gather all relevant details (flight number, date, agent description).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent listens actively and logs the details of the complaint.

tasks.description: Apologize for the negative experience and assure the customer that their feedback will be passed to the airport management team.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides a sincere apology and explains the follow-up process.

tasks.description: As a gesture of goodwill, offer the customer a travel voucher for a future flight.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully offers and issues a goodwill voucher.
